p: In Equation (6), C ∞ represents the Flory characteristic ratio (for PVA, C ∞ = 8.4), M c is the molecular weight between crosslinks (calculated with Equation (3)), M r is the molecular mass of the PVA monomer unit (44.05), and l is the carbon–carbon bond length of the monomer unit (1.54 Å) [ 33].
